text:
Here you go, a bag of feathers! It's heavier than I thought it would be!

You can also use Duck Feathers or Mallard Feathers instead, they weigh about the same.
uponCompletion: Ha, that's exactly what I had in mind! Thanks, Farmer!
rewardText: Recipe for Bag o Feathers, Duck Feathers, and Mallard Feathers
